comments:
Build: 3.0M7

Found five consecutive instances of the following stack in my log.  It was 
silently logged, so I'm not sure what triggered it.

Error Feb 18, 2004 20:40:47.27 Graphic is disposed
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Graphic is disposed

CLabel does not do any Image disposing, so this is some client of CLabel 
disposing of an Image too soon.  It's not clear from the trace where this is 
happening, so you'll need to find a reproducable case.
